CustomField.formula: IF(Apttus__IsTransient__c == FALSE && LOWER(RIGHT( Apttus__Title__c , 5)) = '.docx', HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__OCCIntermediateView?agreementId=" & Apttus__DocumentVersionId__r.Apttus__AgreementId__c & "&attachmentId=" & Apttus__ContentId__c & "&isVersioned=" & IF( Apttus__DocumentVersionId__r.Apttus__AgreementId__r.Apttus__VersionAware__c, "true", "false") & "&retId="& Apttus__DocumentVersionId__c & "&UserUITheme=" & IF( ($User.UITheme == 'Theme4d' || $User.UITheme == 'Theme4u'),'lightning','classic') , IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__DocumentVersionId__r.Apttus__CheckoutById__c)) && Apttus__DocumentVersionId__r.Apttus__CheckoutById__c <> $User.Id, $Label.apttus__Open,$Label.apttus__OpenAndEdit),"_self"), "")
CustomField.label: Document Action
